summary: A marriage of convenience between a petty gangster and an illegal immigrant he has never met has unforeseen consequences for them both.
cast: Choi Min-sik|Cecilia Cheung|Dae-Hoon Jeong|Hyeong-jin Kong|Byung-ho Son|Jin-ho Song
director: Directors: Hae-sung Song (as Hye-seong Song), Hae-sung Song (as Hye-sung Song)
title: Failan
